nodes.text: Bulwark was a battle droid that joined the Directive 7 movement headed by Mentor during the era of the Galactic War. Adopting a new name of its own choosing, Bulwark was among the droids that gathered on the moon Zadd under Mentor's leadership, and was one of the few droids who were not absorbed into Mentor's consciousness. However, Bulwark was destroyed while trying to protect Mentor's core from invaders.
Bulwark appears as one of the bosses in the Flashpoint "Directive 7" in the 2011 BioWare and LucasArts massively multiplayer online roleplaying video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
